title: Projects
intro: Interactive demos showcasing technical skills and enterprise UI patterns. Each project demonstrates real-world development scenarios using modern technologies.

githubDashboard.title: GitHub Activity Dashboard
githubDashboard.description: AWS Console-style dashboard displaying real-time GitHub statistics with interactive charts and metrics. Features multi-tab interface and live data fetching.

dataTable.title: Advanced Data Table
dataTable.description: Enterprise-grade data management interface with pagination, sorting, filtering, and bulk actions. Demonstrates complex table interactions and performance optimization.

wizard.title: Multi-Step Wizard
wizard.description: Complex form workflow with Zod validation and internationalized error messages. Features step navigation, data persistence, and review before submission.

cryptoDashboard.title: Crypto Market Dashboard
cryptoDashboard.description: Real-time cryptocurrency market data with live prices, 24h changes, and trend charts. Auto-refreshing dashboard with configurable intervals.
